solution_line_template: With {green_hangers} green hangers, 1 less blue hanger than there are green hangers is {green_hangers}-{blue_less_than_green}=<<{green_hangers}-{blue_less_than_green}={blue_hangers}>>{blue_hangers} blue hangers.

With {blue_hangers} blue hangers, 1 less yellow hanger less than there are blue hangers is {blue_hangers}-{yellow_less_than_blue}=<<{blue_hangers}-{yellow_less_than_blue}={yellow_hangers}>>{yellow_hangers} yellow hangers.

With {pink_hangers} pink hangers, the total number of colored hangers in Fifi's closet is {pink_hangers}+{green_hangers}+{blue_hangers}+{yellow_hangers}=<<{pink_hangers}+{green_hangers}+{blue_hangers}+{yellow_hangers}={total_hangers}>>{total_hangers} hangers.
